\documentclass[10pt]{article}
\usepackage{pgf,tikz,pgfplots}
\pgfplotsset{compat=1.15}
\usepackage{mathrsfs}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{document}
\definecolor{ffqqqq}{rgb}{1,0,0}
\definecolor{rvwvcq}{rgb}{0.08235294117647059,0.396078431372549,0.7529411764705882}
\definecolor{qqqqff}{rgb}{0,0,1}
\begin{tikzpicture}[line cap=round,line join=round,>=triangle 45,x=1cm,y=1cm]
\begin{axis}[
x=1cm,y=1cm,
axis lines=middle,
ymajorgrids=true,
xmajorgrids=true,
xmin=-0.5002642969423865,
xmax=7.465624482986542,
ymin=-0.47666274585470824,
ymax=4.848227523190073,
xtick={0,1,...,7},
ytick={0,1,...,4},]
\clip(-0.5002642969423865,-0.47666274585470824) rectangle (7.465624482986542,4.848227523190073);
\draw[line width=1.6pt,dotted,color=qqqqff,smooth,samples=100,domain=-0.5002642969423865:7.465624482986542] plot(\x,{4*sin(((\x)/4)*180/pi)+sin(((\x))*180/pi)});
\draw [line width=2pt] (0.11371885140148795,0.2271774414075293)-- (0.6186779442211348,0.24141366135343342);
\draw [line width=2pt] (0.66,1.2701261759353577)-- (1.2813252740331206,1.2736980258854682);
\draw [line width=2pt] (1.26,2.191356226500927)-- (2.379842950329779,2.1901409492047783);
\draw [line width=2pt] (2.458742009953296,2.937813531061028)-- (3.2170081242762656,2.930060351344077);
\draw [line width=2pt] (3.5285536802731942,2.7110225597768114)-- (4.290710722093762,2.7030220285495425);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (0.11371885140148795,0.2271774414075293)-- (0.66,1.2701261759353577);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (0.66,1.2701261759353577)-- (1.26,2.191356226500927);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (1.26,2.191356226500927)-- (2.458742009953296,2.937813531061028);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (2.458742009953296,2.937813531061028)-- (3.5285536802731942,2.7110225597768114);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (3.5285536802731942,2.7110225597768114)-- (4.283536716568564,2.601055100066115);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (4.283536716568564,2.601055100066115)-- (4.844131565510965,2.7525860425751425);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (4.844131565510965,2.7525860425751425)-- (5.385829958871039,3.1180853842891096);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (5.385829958871039,3.1180853842891096)-- (5.914930715176227,3.623072948644342);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=ffqqqq] (5.914930715176227,3.623072948644342)-- (6.469226745591185,4.1806444539153755);
\draw [line width=2pt] (4.283536716568564,2.601055100066115)-- (4.83815198788867,2.6194609194261824);
\draw [line width=2pt] (4.844131565510965,2.7525860425751425)-- (5.385829958871039,2.763188796013933);
\draw [line width=2pt] (5.385829958871039,3.1180853842891096)-- (5.8771378040115705,3.128520270605609);
\draw [line width=2pt] (5.914930715176227,3.623072948644342)-- (6.481824382646071,3.6324257528010237);
\draw [line width=2pt] (6.469226745591185,4.1806444539153755)-- (6.809362946073092,4.18672178321598);
\begin{scriptsize}
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (0.11371885140148795,0.2271774414075293) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (0.66,1.2701261759353577) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (1.26,2.191356226500927) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (2.458742009953296,2.937813531061028) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (1.2813252740331206,1.2736980258854682) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (2.379842950329779,2.1901409492047783) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (0.6186779442211348,0.24141366135343342) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (3.2170081242762656,2.930060351344077) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (3.5285536802731942,2.7110225597768114) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (4.290710722093762,2.7030220285495425) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (4.283536716568564,2.601055100066115) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (4.83815198788867,2.6194609194261824) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (4.844131565510965,2.7525860425751425) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (5.385829958871039,3.1180853842891096) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (5.385829958871039,2.763188796013933) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (5.914930715176227,3.623072948644342) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (5.8771378040115705,3.128520270605609) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [fill=rvwvcq] (6.469226745591185,4.1806444539153755) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (6.481824382646071,3.6324257528010237) circle (2.5pt);
\draw [color=rvwvcq] (6.809362946073092,4.18672178321598) circle (2.5pt);
\end{scriptsize}
\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
